description:
Meet Vinita, a certified yoga and mat Pilates instructor with over 10 years of experience in both practicing and teaching. What began as a simple desire to improve her fitness quickly evolved into a deep passion and lifestyle, motivating her to become a dedicated instructor. Vinita’s enthusiasm for yoga is infectious, and she strives to inspire others to achieve balance, strength, and flexibility in both body and mind.
Her approach to teaching focuses on helping students build strength, increase mobility, and improve flexibility, while emphasizing persistence in reaching personal goals. With Vinita’s guidance, you'll be supported on your journey to become stronger, more mobile, and more aligned with your full potential.
title: Vinita Wanere
